bullzeye, Visual Basic 2005 is completely different then the version of Visual Basic shown in the tutorial. VB2K5 is .NET while VB 6 still runs off of VB Runtimes.

item.title: [VB] How to make a Runescape client in Visual Basic
item.dc:creator: @ThE_ViKinG ThE ViKinG
item.description:
@ThE_ViKinG wrote:

[quote=“Keinieboy007, post:16, topic:1393”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=1389.msg14820#msg14820 date=1145459131]

is it possible to use a deob to make a client in vb?

Lol, no. VB and Java are two COMPLETELY different languages. Plus, if RS was made in VB it’d suck.
[/quote]

well you are wrong at one point… I made my java rs client communicate with my vb host for auth check[br][size=1]Posted at: May 14, 2006, 03:26:24 am[/size][/quote]
wich point? lol :rolleyes:
